      • setProfile

        public T setProfile(String profile)
        Set a map matching profile. You should use one of the constants found in DirectionsCriteria.
        Parameters:
        profile - String containing A directions profile ID; either driving, walking, or cycling. Use one of the DirectionsCriteria constants.
        Returns:
        Builder
        Since:
        2.0.0
